subject: Re: [junit] Is it guaranteed that setUp will always run before a test method ?
msgSnippet: ... Did you type setUp correctly? Show us the code. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com Author, JUnit
messageBody:
sergiohm wrote:
>
>
> I'm running a Suite which invokes a bunch of Test Cases. When running
> through the suite, some tests fail because a variable which is
> initialized in the setUp method has not been initialized yet. So, how
> can this happen ? A test method being invoked before the setUp method
> runs ? Is it a bug ? BTW, when I run the Test Case individually the
> test method works.

Did you type "setUp" correctly?

Show us the code.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
